Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People across Australia have been discussing the national budget some sharing analyses and opinions while others praise the efforts to uplift disadvantaged communities. Many have highlighted the specific relief measures introduced for different demographics such as those for women high-income earners and Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander communities. The budget has been described as aimimg to assist those doing it tough investing in the future and promoting equality for woman. The Government's commitment to incorporating First Nations voices in the budget process also garnered appreciation.
